root.description: This project is a lottery in which you enter by paying a specific entrance fee and it runs after a specific interval of time pass. It runs on Sepolia or Anvil. It used VRF to generate the random number to pick the winner and it relay of ChainLink automation.
root.name: foundry-raffle
